parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, specifying the current page number for paginated queries.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Page size, specifying the number of records per page for paginated queries.

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description: WAF operation phase, specifying the rule set phase to query.

parameters.name: QueryArgs
parameters.description: Query parameters, passed in JSON format, containing various filtering conditions.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.
